And also, there's writing characters doing stuff, and then there's trying to explain why and how characters are doing stuff.
Which is easy to not get right.
Not to mention trying to figure out what info people will grasp through the artworks and context, and what  needs to be specifically explained.
Thats the part that would mess me up the most, I think
Will people notice that a character has done/not done a thing, or does it need to be pointed out...
